ai-tha-ap293:1.1_0: “They’ve been born by name or clan,
ai-tha-ap293:2.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
ai-tha-ap293:2.3_0: But then I offered the flowers
ai-tha-ap293:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap293:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap293:4.2_0: sentient beings are born of mind.
ai-tha-ap293:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap293:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap293:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap293:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap293:7.1_0: he was a quailing with the senior monks.
